name: The Contact
description: A roleplay game with freedom of choice, police wanted System, criminal activities, home invasions, stealing, open world and a thrilling story.. with no need to follow!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista + Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
